rules_text: Move Heaven and Earth deals 3 damage to each creature.
special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.)[/i]
I – Each player sacrifices three nonbasic lands. Move Heaven and Earth deals 3 damage to each creature.
II, III – For each opponent, if they control more lands than you, create a Treasure token. Otherwise, create a 4/4 red Elemental creature token.
